name: LaikaCoin
description:
LaikaCoin is a decentralized finance (DeFi) meme token named after the first dog in space, Laika.

LaikaCoin is a combination of RFI tokenomics and an auto-liquidity generating protocol. On each transaction 5% is locked into the liquidity pool and 3% is distributed as a static reward amongst holders.

LaikaCoin was created on April 16th, 2021 and was first made available for sale on April 20th, 2021.

SafeMoon launched on Mar. 8, 2021.

LaikaCoins tokenomics provide a deterrent to high frequency trading while the 3% distribution provides a cushion between large institutional buyers and retail investors. The 5% burn contributes to a rising price floor with the goal of helping investors in the long term.

LaikaCoin has a total supply of 100,000,000,000,000,000 tokens with 50,000,000,000,000,000 burned and a fair launch supply of 50,000,000,000,000,000. The developers of the token retained 4% for marketing and promotion activities.

Liquidity for LaikaCoin is locked in a Dxlocker and ownership of the contract has been renounced by the developers.

DxLocker Ownership renounce transaction

You can purchase LaikaCoin on PancakeSwap
